Status.Description: This means you got punched in the throat. Way to go. Now you can't cast spells. Disappears after combat.

Status.Name: Uma's Massage

Status.Name: Web-Silence
Status.Description: You have been silenced from casting spells due to webs on your face. Disappears after combat.

Status.Name: wormsHalf
Status.Description: Gained from choosing 'Who Cares?' at the worms sign. Halves the chance that worms will be encountered.

Status.Name: wormsOff
Status.Description: Gained from choosing 'Grossed Out' at the worms sign. Worms are turned off and will not appear in the game.

Status.Name: wormsOn
Status.Description: Gained from choosing 'Aroused' or 'Who Cares?' at the worms sign. Worms are turned on and will appear in the game.

Flag.Description: 1 for male, 2 for female, 3 for herm. This also controls the egg's shell color.

Flag.Name: EMBER_TYPE
Flag.Description: Numerical value: Ember is supposed to have many forms, this will control which one is born. (This is important for when Ember has hybrid forms.)

Flag.Name: EMBER_HAIR
Flag.Description: 0 for no hair, 1 for hair, 2 for mane.

Flag.Name: EMBER_OVIPOSITION
Flag.Description: 0 for no egg laying, 1 for egg laying.

Flag.Name: EMBER_ROUNDFACE

Flag.Name: EMBER_EGG_FLUID_COUNT
Flag.Description: This controls when it's time to hatch. Every item use and every time you use the egg as a masturbation aid, this will be incremented. Threshold for birthing is 5, but the birthing process can only be triggered when using as a masturbatory aid. This is done to allow players the chance to modify Ember before actually hatching.

Flag.Name: EMBER_STAT
